A new TV is such a major investment that it's important to find one that really works for you. Whether you need a model to make your favorite shows and movies really shine or want a set that can jump between streaming services with ease, the Sony A90J Bravia is one of the best TVs we've ever tried. Even better, it's on sale at Amazon now for a great price.

Whether you need a 55-, 65- or 83-inch screen, there's a 4K OLED smart TV on sale. Typically listed from $2,799.99 for the 55-inch model, right now a $501.99 price cut brings the total price down to $2,298. The 65-inch model sees the same $501.99 price cut that brings the price down to $3,298. Meanwhile, the 83-inch size has been marked down 25% off its list price of $7,99.99 to $5,998.

When we tested the A90J, we were impressed by the deep black levels that created stunning contrasts in its images. It's also one of the brightest OLED TVs we've ever seen, and is exceptional at capturing colors. The A90J also has two different stand positions, that let it either stand on adjustable feet so you can slide a soundbar underneath or with the feet to the side of the panels supporting the screen. 

The A90J also comes loaded with features that appeal to cinephiles and gamers alike. Two of its four HDMI ports support 4K content, Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos-compatible sound systems to get the most out of games on the PlayStation 5 or the Xbox Series X. Its internal speakers are also capable of spatially positioning audio based on the location of the subjects in the frame. One of the TV's biggest improvements is in its interface software, jumping from Android TV to Google TV for faster menu navigation and easier user interface. 

If you're looking to get the most out of your favorite shows, movies and games, the Sony A90J is a great choice. Be sure to shop fast though, as a deal this good means this deal won't last long.

Get the Sony A90J Bravia XR OLED 4K Ultra HD Smart Google TV at Amazon from $2,298 (save $501.99 to $2,001.99).
